# Jump, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a grasshopperâ€™s hind leg)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Shining South (WotC), pg. 47

This spell functions like *[[Jump (Spell)|jump]]*, except that it affects a group of creatures in an area, all of which gain a +10 enhancement bonus on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] checks. The enhancement bonus increases to +20 at caster level 10th, and to +30 (the maximum) at caster level 14th.

Pirates are fond of this spell during boarding actions.
